beneficiary.name: International Exports Limited
beneficiary.address: Export House, Industrial Estate, Chennai-600001, India

presentation_period: Documents must be presented within 21 days after the date of shipment
required_documents: Signed Commercial Invoice in triplicate indicating LC number and contract number
Full set of Clean on Board Ocean Bills of Lading made out to order of issuing bank blank endorsed marked freight prepaid
Packing List showing gross/net weights and measurements
Certificate of Origin issued by DCCI (Dhaka Chamber of Commerce & Industry)
GSP Certificate Form A if applicable
Marine Insurance Certificate covering Institute Cargo Clauses (A) for 110% of invoice value
Inspection Certificate issued by SGS or equivalent inspection company
certificate_requirements: Certificate of Origin must be issued by Dhaka Chamber of Commerce & Industry (DCCI) and duly signed by authorized signatory
description_of_goods: 100% Cotton Woven Fabrics, Plain Weave, Bleached, Width 58/60 inches, Weight 120-140 GSM, HS Code: 5208.21.00 as per Proforma Invoice PI-2024-CHN-001 dated 2024-01-05
payment_terms: By negotiation of documents at sight
insurance_coverage: Marine and War Risks covering 110% of CIF value
special_conditions: All documents must be in English
Courier receipts in lieu of originals acceptable for all documents except Bills of Lading
Documents must indicate contract number CTR-2024-001

_test_metadata.purpose: Comprehensive test covering all major compliance areas
